headline: CQG Enters into Agreement for Acquisition by Broadridge
summary: CQG, a leading provider of futures and options trading, execution management and market connectivity, today announced it has entered into an agreement with global Fintech leader Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:BR) for Broadridge to acquire CQG. CQG will add complementary execution management, algorithmic trading and analytics capabilities to Broadridge's order management and client connectivity solutions, creating an end-to-end trading suite for global futures and options markets.

headline: Broadridge to Acquire CQG, Expanding Global Futures and Options Trading Capabilities
summary: Global Fintech leader Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. CQG will add complementary execution management, algorithmic trading, and analytics capabilities to Broadridge's order management and client connectivity solutions, creating an end-to-end trading suite for global futures and options markets.
